REUTERS.UNKNOWN: C G f2249 reute u f BC-ussr-sunseed/cott-est 04-09 0053

TEXT.TITLE: USDA ESTIMATES USSR COTTON CROP
TEXT.BODY: The U.S. Agriculture Department forecast the Soviet 1986/87 cotton crop at 11.20 mln bales (480-lbs net), vs 11.20 mln bales forecast last month. The department also estimated the 1985/86 Soviet cotton crop at 12.10 mln bales, vs 12.10 mln bales last month. Reuter
